name: Human Rights Without Frontiers International
membership:
Human Rights and Democracy Network (HRDN)
International Consortium on Law and Religious Studies (ICLRS)
goal:
Promotion of democracy, the rule of law and human rights.
Fight against intolerance and discrimination on the basis of ethnicity, religion, gender, using missions in the field, publishing reports, organising media campaigns, developing advocacy at the EU, the UN and the OSCE in particular.
Fight against the abuse of pre-trial detention and in favour of fair trial.
interests: Borders and Security, Culture, Education and training, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives:
Monitoring of EU activities in the following areas:
Human rights in the world
Freedom of religion or belief
Security and religion
Ethnic and religious minorities
Women's rights
LGBTQI people and human rights
